definition: erhua variant of 話茬|话茬[hua4 cha2]
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
stubble land after crop has been taken/a second crop obtained by rotation of land/an opportunity
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc

sentences.english: Ms. Olin, teacher of sixth-grade French, nearly shouted.
sentences.chinese: 六年级法语老师欧林抢过话茬儿，几乎就要叫出来了。

definition: to joke/to laugh insincerely/to make merry/to talk irrelevantly
to read smoothly (of text)/to blurt out (without thinking)/to suit one's taste (of food)
to diverge/to branch off the road/to change (the subject)
words of politeness/politesse/decorous talking/talk with propriety
to talk about this and that (idiom); to ramble incoherently
interruption/to interrupt (esp. talk)/to change the subject
to comply in order to please others/to accommodate sb else's taste/to make fun of
